pages.text: $(1)My engineering-oriented friends have been increasingly curious of the Crucible's response to $(4)Redstone Signalling$(1). So, let us investigate.$(p)There are two avenues to explore: $(item)Input$(1) and $(item)Output$(1).

$(1)Output seems simple enough; a $(item)Comparator$(1) reacts to the Crucible. While the signal increases with Power level, I can't help but think $(4)other factors might also have an influence$(1)$(p)$(item)Input$(1) is somewhat more interesting. I believe that a strong enough Redstone signal $(4)might affect the wards of the Crucible in some way$(1).
